api.title: API Reference
api.description: This document provides detailed information about the Zhenglong Protocol's smart contract interfaces and functions.

architecture.title: Architecture Overview
architecture.description: Zhenglong Protocol is built on a robust and secure architecture that enables the creation and management of synthetic assets. This document provides a high-level overview of the protocol's architecture.

coming-next.title: Coming Next
coming-next.description: Zhenglong has an ambitious roadmap for expanding and enhancing the protocol's capabilities. Here's what's coming next:

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Zhenglong: Supercharged Yield. Smarter Leverage. Fully Steamed.

fees.title: Protocol Fees
fees.description: Zhenglong: Supercharged Yield. Smarter Leverage. Fully Steamed.

genesis-vaults.title: Genesis Vaults
genesis-vaults.description: To launch new markets efficiently and fairly, Zhenglong uses Genesis Vaults — time-limited vaults that bootstrap liquidity, collateral backing, and community participation from day one.

getting-started.title: Quick Start
getting-started.description: Get started with Zhenglong in just a few steps. Connect your wallet, choose your strategy, and start earning supercharged yield!

index.title: Supercharged Yield. Smarter Leverage.
index.description: Let's be real: synthetic assets sound powerful. But most of them? Clunky, brittle, overly complicated — and definitely not paying your bills.

risk-considerations.title: Risk Considerations
risk-considerations.description: While Zhenglong is designed with security as a top priority, it's important for users to understand the potential risks involved. This document outlines the key risks to be aware of when interacting with the protocol.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.description: Zhenglong: Supercharged Yield. Smarter Leverage. Fully Steamed.

stability-pools.title: Stability Pools
stability-pools.description: Stability Pools are a core mechanism in Zhenglong that provides security, yield generation, and automated rebalancing capabilities.

steam-token.title: STEAM Token
steam-token.description: STEAM is the native governance, incentive, and revenue-sharing token of the Zhenglong ecosystem. It plays a central role in coordinating the protocol's growth, securing market health, and rewarding community participation.

steam-token/earning.title: Earning STEAM
steam-token/earning.description: Users can earn STEAM through various protocol activities:

steam-token/overview.title: STEAM Token Overview
steam-token/overview.description: STEAM is the native governance, incentive, and revenue-sharing token of the Zhenglong ecosystem. It plays a central role in coordinating the protocol's growth, securing market health, and rewarding community participation.

steam-token/tokenomics.title: STEAM Tokenomics
steam-token/tokenomics.description: Zhenglong is built to reward long-term participation, decentralize governance, and create sustainable liquidity incentives. All token allocations are transparently structured and time-released.

yield.title: How Yield is Generated for zheTOKENS
yield.description: Zhenglong's high yields come from concentrating all the yield from the protocol's collateral into a smaller pool of active users.
